text: Hyun Soong-jong (February 26 (Lunar January 26), 1919 - May 25, 2020) was a South Korean politician. He served as Prime Minister from October 1992New Straits Times. "Roh picks don as new PM". 8 October 1992, p. 23. Retrieved on 30 August 2013. through 1993. He was nominated by then-President of South Korea Roh Tae-woo. Soong-jung died on May 25, 2020 at the age of 101.'노태우정부 마지막 총리' 현승종 전 한림대 총장 At the time of his death, he was the oldest known living former state leader. Mustafa Ben Halim succeeded him with this distinction ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea
title: Hyun Soong-jong
